titleStmt.title: SII 13.29: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 29. (A.R. No. 285 of 1906.) TIRUMĀLPURAM, ARKONAM TALUK, NORTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE WEST WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, MAṆIKAṆṬHĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records an endowment of 15 kaḻañju of gold by Madhurāntakaṉ Gaṇḍarādittaṉ for the daily supply of an uḻakku of oil for a lamp in the temple of Tirumālpēṟṟāḻvār, to be made by the ūrār (assembly) of Śerugūr in Valla-nāḍu, a division of Dāmar-kōṭṭam, in whose charge the amount was left by the donor. The inscription is evidently one of Rājarāja I since the donor largely figures in the other records of this king.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirācakecaripanmaṟku yāṇṭu 3Āvatu tāmarkkoṭṭattu vallanāṭṭuc cerukūr Ūrom kaiyeḻuttu . maturāntakaṉ kaṇṭarātittaṉ pakkal (vi)yāṅkaḷ koṇṭu kaṭava tuḷaika ta
nmakaṭṭaḷaiyāṟ patiṉaiṅkaḻañcu poṉ vom Ippe kkup pe li tirumāṟpeṟṟu mahādevarkku Oru nontāviḷakkiṉukku cantrātittavaṟ nicatam muḻak ke
ṇṇai tirunāraṇattoṭokku muḻakkāl tirumānpeṟṟāḻvārkku cotiviḷakkiṉukku nicata muḻakkeṇṇai Aṭṭuvomāṉom cantrātittaval Ivveṇṇai muṭṭāmai Aṭṭuvo māṉom cerukūr Ūrom .
Ivveṇṇai muṭṭil dhanmātaṉa muḷviṭṭu tāmanṟāṭu kovukku nicatam Araikkāl poṉ manṟa voṭṭik kuṭuttom Immaṉṟupāṭiṟuttum Ivveṇṇai muṭṭāmai Aṭṭuvomāṉom Eṇṇai Eṭukkavantāṉu
kku nicatam moru coṟu kuṭuppomāṉom Itu vaṉṟeṉṟom keṅkaiiṭaik kumariiṭai ceytār ceyta pāvam paṭuvom Ipparicoṭṭi cilālekai ceytu kuṭuttom cerukūr Ūrom Ūraār colla Eḻutiṉeṉ
Ivvūr vaikāṉasaṉ kūṭṭattā ṉāṟpattiruvaṉeṉ Ivai Eṉ ṉeḻuttu Itu panmāheśvarar yirakṣai .—
Digital edition of SII 13.29 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
